00033 class POPPLER_CPP_EXPORT page : public poppler::noncopyable
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     enum orientation_enum {
00037         landscape,
00038         portrait,
00039         seascape,
00040         upside_down
00041     };
00042     enum search_direction_enum {
00043         search_from_top,
00044         search_next_result,
00045         search_previous_result
00046     };
00047     enum text_layout_enum {
00048         physical_layout,
00049         raw_order_layout
00050     };
00051 
00052     ~page();
00053 
00054     orientation_enum orientation() const;
00055     double duration() const;
00056     rectf page_rect(page_box_enum box = crop_box) const;
00057     ustring label() const;
00058 
00059     page_transition* transition() const;
00060 
00061     bool search(const ustring &text, rectf &r, search_direction_enum direction,
00062                 case_sensitivity_enum case_sensitivity, rotation_enum rotation = rotate_0) const;
00063     ustring text(const rectf &rect = rectf()) const;
00064     ustring text(const rectf &rect, text_layout_enum layout_mode) const;
00065
